---
title: Doxycycline
---


# Oral Doxycycline

- Has excellent CNS penetration @roosNeurologicComplicationsLyme2021

Treatment:

- Oral was found to be as effective as IV antibiotics for neuroborreliosis @roosNeurologicComplicationsLyme2021

# Contraindications

- Doxycycline is not recommended in pregnant women, women who are breast-feeding, and children younger than 8 years of age @roosNeurologicComplicationsLyme2021
- A short course of doxycycline is not likely to stain teeth @roosNeurologicComplicationsLyme2021
